data.title: Drinks before and after the Quarter
data.text: This was a perfect spot to gather the troops before strolling the French Quarter.  Comfortable atmosphere, personable bar tenders, and security at the door.  Not that the bar is unsafe, but everyone inside the bar is safe...that's my kind of place, where you can go to the Big Easy and actually take it easy.  Close to Poydras and some of my favorites to eat, the trolley, and Bourbon Street.  Go and take a picture with the piano!

data.title: Quite Enjoyable!
data.text: We got into town late on Friday after 4 hours of driving. We ventured down to Bourbon for a hand grenade then walked back toward our hotel and found this joint. The music was loud (not too loud) and upbeat. There were several small groups of people hanging out. The bartenders were on point. Great place to relax and unwind.

data.title: New location. Even better now!
data.text: VooDoo II was at 346 Baronne for many years. There, connected to a hotel it was a great place. The NEW location, around the corner at 330 Carondelet Street (corner or Union) is even better! Larger, brand new, on the streetcar line, now 1 block from the parade route and St Charles Avenue and featuring the same great staff. The owners brought over all the super-cool decor from the original VooDoo II-- the beaded baby grand piano, the Marie Laveau artwork, the 'leg-bottom' cocktail tables and now, a pool table. Done up nicely with a great sound system/jukebox it's definitely the new, hot, downtown hangout. The owner tells me food is planned as well. Comfy place, prices nice, great service from Rene' and Natalie, 6 big screens and great drinks. Jump off the streetcar on the corner (Gravier and Carondelet) and step in!

data.title: One of the best
data.text: Don't let name scare you this place has some of the best barbecue you'll ever put in your mouth the brisket was so good I had to have 2 of them everything this place got is good I'll definetly have to come back here when I come back to New Orleans

data.title: Good choice for a lady alone
data.text: Nice atmosphere, quiet, safe place for a cocktail.  Bartender personable, clientele well mannered.  Wish they ha at least bar food, but the I'm not complaining.

data.title: Hoodoo Voodoo
data.text: Great bar. Staff excellent, warm, friendly, welcoming and efficient. Nice mix of clientele locals tourists and local business people. Chilled kick back place to spend an hour or two ok possibly three or four. Looking forward to my next visit to say hi to Liz and Natalie Thank you for making me welcome

data.title: Nice place
data.text: It was connected to the hotel we were staying at. It was a nice place to sit and relax at after a long day.

data.title: Early evening drinx
data.text: I liked the place, which despite being in a nondescript hotel building has real character... good (recorded) music, good staff quick service.  A good neighbourhood bar..

data.title: Buena opcion
data.text: Me encanto la decoracion del bar. Tiene gran variedad de cervezas. Lo mejor es que puedes encontrar una mesa se billar, tragamonedas y una rockola. El ambiente es super agradable.

data.title: Buen ambiente!
data.text: Si lo que buscan es un lugar con la música fuerte, pero no tanto como para no poder hablar, donde haya gente gente, pero no demasiada como para no poder moverse, este lugar es ideal!

data.title: Unsere Hotelbar
data.text: Für uns das ende von erstaunlichen Tagen - immer einen Schlenderschluck wert. Aber ich würde dort nicht extra hingehen, wenn ich nicht im Hotel oder der Umgebung wohnte...
